thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses USA | www.smartbuyglasses.com | 3 of 161
thread.title: MC61

author: MC61
title: MC61
text:
I ordered a pair of Tom Ford glasses, which arrived within a few days (from Hong-Kong to the USA). Glasses were 100% original (I double checked it with a website dedicated to how to spot fakes), and brand new.
Unfortunately they did not fit me well, so I had to return them, and they refunded me promptly, within a day after they received them. Costumer support was great. I will order again in the future for sure!
